info.name: GESFARM API Documentation
info.description: API de gestion d'une ferme agropastorale avec un accent sur la gestion avicole

item.name: Authentication
item.description: APIs for user authentication and management

request.description: Authenticate user and return access token
Get the authenticated user's profile information

item.name: Cattle Management
item.description: APIs for managing cattle and their records

query.description: Search in tag number and name

request.description: Retrieve a paginated list of cattle
Retrieve a specific cattle with its records
Record daily cattle data (milk production, weight, health, etc.)

item.name: Crop Management
item.description: APIs for managing crops and agricultural activities

query.description: Filter by status (planted, growing, harvested, failed)

request.description: Retrieve a paginated list of crops
Retrieve a specific crop with its activities
Record an agricultural activity for a crop
Retrieve activities for a specific crop

item.name: Dashboard
item.description: APIs for dashboard data and KPIs

request.description: Retrieve key performance indicators and summary data
Get stock items with low stock or expired items

request.description: Check the health status of the API and database

item.name: Poultry Management
item.description: APIs for managing poultry flocks, records, and incubation

query.description: Filter by flock type (layer, broiler, duck, turkey)
Search in flock number and breed

request.description: Retrieve a paginated list of poultry flocks
Retrieve a specific poultry flock with its records
Record daily poultry data (eggs, feed, mortality, etc.)
Update incubation record with hatching results

item.name: Reports
item.description: APIs for generating reports and analytics

request.description: Generate poultry production report for a date range
Generate cattle production report for a date range

query.description: Filter by movement type (in, out, adjustment)

request.description: Generate stock movement report for a date range
Retrieve a list of stock categories
Retrieve a specific stock category with its items

item.name: Stock Management
item.description: APIs for managing stock items and movements

request.description: Retrieve a paginated list of stock items with optional filtering
Retrieve a specific stock item with its movements

item.name: Task Management
item.description: APIs for managing tasks and work assignments

query.description: Filter by task type (agricultural, livestock, maintenance, administrative)
Filter by status (pending, in_progress, completed, cancelled)
Filter by priority (low, medium, high, urgent)

request.description: Retrieve a paginated list of tasks

request.description: Get tasks assigned to the authenticated user

item.name: User Management
item.description: APIs for managing users and roles

request.description: Retrieve a paginated list of users

item.name: Zone Management
item.description: APIs for managing farm zones and cartography

query.description: Filter by zone type (cultivation, pasture, enclosure, building, water_point)

request.description: Retrieve a paginated list of zones
